title: What My 5 Year Old Son Taught Me About Persuasion On His Birthday
itunes:title: What My 5 Year Old Son Taught Me About Persuasion On His Birthday
description:
My five-year-old son masterfully used three powerful persuasion tactics on me to get his way, add these to your arsenal.

This episode will help you master sales and persuasion, which is critical for building a successful business as an entrepreneur.

Learn more about Underdog Empowerment here: https://underdogempowerment.com
